messages.subject: Re: the Leonides
messages.msgSnippet: Tia, We stayed up to watch them too (here in Northern CA). We went to a friend s house (she has some large clearings between the trees - for a better view),
messages.messageBody:
Tia,
We stayed up to watch them too (here in Northern CA).
We went to a friend's house (she has some large
clearings between the trees - for a better view),
hoping that the sky would clear before 2am. Luckily it
did! What a great experience, it was beautiful! We
were completely awed by the magic of the universe that
night.
Meghan

<<I hadn't thought it would be
clear
enough on the Wet Coast of Canada to see the Leonides
last night, but
they
were quite spectacular (for the little while that I
could stay awake to
watch).
Tia>>
